column4: has anyone here had the problem of azureus not starting correctly (this is direct from azureus, and java from sun.java.com)
you should have no need to install java from java.sun.com, you should install the one available from the repositories
eh azureus and java from the repositories is not stable in my experience
and make sure you are launching azureus with the "true" java, not the first one found by the azureus launcher script :P
